question: Can I get a pre-approved mortgage with my current financial status?
true_answer: Yes, you can be pre-approved. With a credit score of 720 and a DTI of 35%, you're in a good position.

steps.content: Can I get a pre-approved mortgage with my current financial status?
Plan: 1) Home loan eligibility criteria. 2) Credit score check. 3) Calculate DTI. 4) Supervisor review. 5) Provide final answer.
Retrieving information on pre-approval criteria for mortgages.
Pre-approval generally requires credit score above 700 and a stable income.
Checking current credit score of the user.
User's credit score is 720, which is above the typical requirement.
The calculated DTI is 35%, which is within acceptable limits.
How long does the pre-approval process take?
Retrieving information on pre-approval process duration.
Pre-approval generally takes 1 to 3 business days.
Review complete, all eligibility criteria satisfied.
Yes, you can be pre-approved. With a credit score of 720 and a DTI of 35%, you're in a good position. The process takes 1 to 3 business days.
